programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a he-said, she-said case when a woman crashes a wedding to accuse her therapist of sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team work to uncover a pregnant teenager's secret when she refuses to name the baby's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the SVU team help a teenage exchange student from Italy after she's assaulted by a cab driver.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman was assaulted inside a synagogue; Benson is dismayed to find that Rob Miller is out on bail.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it; despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial predator targeting men in gay bars proves difficult to catch, until a celebrity comes forward with his story.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While working under cover to bust a sex trafficking ring, Carisi meets a woman who embedded herself in the organization in hope of finding and saving her daughter; Sgt. Benson is faced with a life-changing revelation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Efforts to find an 8-year-old boy kidnapped for ransom are hindered by tension between the child's estranged parents; Sgt. Benson is asked to take the lieutenant's exam and officially become the leader of the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Johnny D (Charles Halford) is on trial for sex trafficking, rape, assault and kidnapping, Noah's adoption becomes involved with the case, causing Benson to fear for the child's future; a threat could permanently change the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old who was part of a group of kids who put a transgender teen in the hospital is tried as an adult, the SVU team wonders whether the punishment fits the crime.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: With the FBI closing in on the Roy Walton investigation, Voight and Halstead strategize a way out; after a city bus driver is shot by a passenger, the team investigates a possible abduction.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team searches for a missing child in what turns out to be a very complicated case; Burgess and Ruzek are in for a shock when someone from Makayla's past comes forward.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight employs his new informant to help solve a tricky drug trafficking case; Atwater, who once again struggles to reconcile his personal and professional life, reaches a decision.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team works together to identify the head of the brutal Los Temidos gang; Voight dives deeper into his informant Anna Avalos' past when her undercover role is threatened.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: While out for a jog, Upton witnesses a horrible car crash and risks her own life to save the passengers; after learning more about the victims, the team must track down the man responsible for the brutal crash.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team searches for a brutal killer with a signature modus operandi; Burgess and Ruzek double down in their fight to retain custody of Makayla.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a young man is shot outside the CÃ¡rabo Bakery, the team works to connect the shooting to bakery owner Javier Escano, who has been under surveillance; despite the increasing danger, Voight helps informant Anna Avalos get closer to their target.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Chief Hawkins goes above and beyond to help Brett and Violet with a problem; Kidd pursues an open lieutenant position; a blast from the past asks Mouch and Herrmann for a favor.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Following an injury in the aftermath of an industrial fire, Severide and Seager work together to investigate an anonymous tip; Kidd searches for the right person to fill the open spot on Truck 81; a possible new recruit to 51 gets tested at a call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz forms a bond with a young immigrant boy he meets while fighting an apartment fire; Squad makes plans to prank the newest member of their team; Hawkins and Violet struggle to keep their relationship a secret.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Kidd work with CPD regarding a suspicious car wreck; Hawkins and Violet's relationship is in jeopardy; Chloe and Cruz adjust to a new family dynamic.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 must band together when one of its own is taken hostage.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: Black Panther's mettle as king gets tested when an old enemy draws him into a conflict that puts his nation and the world at risk. The king must soon rally his allies and release his full power to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a female video game developer who has been receiving death threats refuses to delay the launch of her new game, the cops must work to protect her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba's efforts to make an arrest in a case involving pornographic photos is stalled when several suspects come down with the measles; Amaro receives distressing news about his son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unarmed black man is shot during the pursuit of a suspect, raising racial tensions; Barba must indict the three officers involved -- who claim they followed procedure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen, Sam, Granger and Deeks get arrested as the result of planted evidence on the day Under Secretary Duggan arrives for Hetty's resignation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Hetty goes rogue, she leaves the NCIS team completely in the dark; the mole kidnaps one of the agents.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: An NCIS agent is held at an unknown location and tortured by the mole, and another agent discovers he was betrayed by someone he least expected.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman claims that the baby she kidnapped is hers with a respected legal expert, the investigation changes the lives of two families.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager is sexually assaulted and left for dead in an alley after attending a movie star's party; Benson is suspicious when security footage from the party goes missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman wants to recant her testimony and free her father, who was incarcerated for incest and rape when she was a child; Capt. Cragen, who remembers the original investigation, tries to help the team.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins' mother throws her a baby shower; the team's investigation into the rape of a violinist by her colleague leads to Rollins' fugitive sister; Sgt. Mike Dodds reports for his first day.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the 13-year-old daughter of a reality-TV family discovers she's pregnant, the team investigates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-school student plans a secret hookup with a female teacher, but ends up in a sinister situation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Sgt. Olivia Benson attempts to thwart a violent home invasion, she gets more than she bargains for and becomes a hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Erin Lindsay and Antonio Dawson from Chicago P.D. help SVU when two convicted murderers escape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU begins investigating members of a top youth hockey team after a savage hazing takes place in a locker room.

programme.desc: When alien invaders lay waste to planet Earth, it's up to a select group of survivors to make a last-ditch stand.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2025
programme.desc: Yui Kamiji seeks her fifth Roland-Garros Women's Wheelchair Singles title as she takes on Dutch second seed Aniek van Koot.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2025
programme.desc: Action from the Men's Singles final at Roland-Garros as world number one Jannik Sinner must overcome defending champion Carlos Alcaraz to claim a maiden title win in Paris.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2025
programme.desc: Action from the final of the 2025 Roland-Garros Women's Singles as the top two seeds, Belarusian Aryna Sabalenka and American Coco Gauff, vie for glory on Court Philippe-Chatrier.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Manchester City fight for their place in the UEFA Champions League as they face Club Brugge at Etihad Stadium. Only a win will be enough for City to qualify for the play-off round.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League clash between Stuttgart and Paris Saint-Germain at MHPArena. Stuttgart need a point to secure their spot in the play-off round.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Inter and Monaco face-off at San Siro. Can Adi Hutter's Monaco side cause an upset and break into the top eight?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Barcelona take on Atalanta at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys. Aston Villa will be hoping top-eight rivals Atalanta slip up in this pivotal game.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Juventus face Benfica at Allianz Stadium. Juve have lost six of their eight previous meetings with Benfica in European competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Lille meet Dutch side Feyenoord at Stade Pierre-Mauroy. Both sides are still in the hunt for a top-eight finish.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the crucial UEFA Champions League clash between Aston Villa and Celtic at Villa Park. A win for Unai Emery's Villans could see them secure a top-eight finish.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Spanish side Girona welcome Arsenal to Estadi Montilivi. Mikel Arteta's Gunners are looking to make it six wins out of eight in the UCL.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Benfica host Barcelona at Estadio de Luz. Can Bruno Lage's Benfica halt Hansi Flick's free-scoring Barca side?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as winless Bologna face Nuri Sahin's top-eight contenders Borussia Dortmund at Stadio Renato Dall'Ara.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Red Star take on PSV Eindhoven at Rajko Mitic Stadium. Red Star are on the longest current run of UCL games without a clean sheet.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Paris Saint-Germain face Manchester City in a crucial showdown at Parc des Princes. Defeat for City could see them slip out of the play-off places.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Feyenoord face Bayern Munich at De Kuip. Bayern are unbeaten in their last eight UCL games against Dutch opponents.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Dutch champions PSV Eindhoven face Liverpool at Philips Stadion. Arne Slot's Reds are guaranteed to finish top of the table if they avoid defeat.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio AgÃ¼ero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.desc: Peter Crouch and Joe Cole have been going head-to-head this year, trying their hand at various sports. This is the best of.

programme.title: Australian Rules

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Brisbane Lions go head-to-head with GWS Giants at The Gabba. This highly anticipated match is part of Round 14 of the AFL season.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face Geelong Cats at Marvel Stadium. With Geelong Cats on form, will Essendon keep possession and ensure precise ball movement for a win?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as North Melbourne take on Fremantle at Optus Stadium. Both teams have had inconsistency in their recent games. Can be anyone's game.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Port Adelaide face Melbourne at Adelaide Oval. Whilst Port Adelaide has has a mixed run lately, will Melbourne secure a victory?

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: An afternoon to remember for all Chelsea supporters as the Blues run riot at Anfield.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Great derby victory.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We rewind back to the 2005/06 campaign as Arsenal hosted West Ham in the 2,000th match to be staged at Highbury. The Hammers were looking for their first win here in 11 years.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the thrilling match between Sheffield United and Arsenal from the 2006/07 season. Defender Phil Jagielka would end the game in goal for the hosts.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Newcastle appeared in a thrilling game against Spurs at White Hart Lane during the 2006/07 season.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit a dramatic -of-season clash at Old Trafford from 2006/07 between Manchester United and West Ham. The Hammers needed to win to pull-off an amazing relegation escape.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Relive this classic Premier League clash between Tottenham and Aston Villa at White Hart Lane. The visitors led 4-1 after 60 minutes but Tottenham staged a remarkable comeback.

programme.title: Prem Classics
